reecord1.itemDesc:
Retain the original look of apple iPhone 6S/6 by using extremely Slim case. 
	                 It is 1.2mm in thickness and weighs less than 18 grams.

Rolex watches are crafted from the finest raw materials and assembled with

Aviator Classic sunglasses are a timeless model that combines great 
	                 aviator styling with exceptional quality.

reecord2.itemDesc:

						Deep, powerful sound for the music you love.
